title: #228 – RZA: Wu-Tang Clan, Kung Fu, Chess, God, Life, and Death
description: RZA is a rapper, record producer, filmmaker, actor, writer, philosopher, and the mastermind of the legendary hip hop group Wu-Tang Clan.
